name: Arena of Ages
description:
The civilization game made for multiplayer:  Pick your civilization, duke it out with friends, and finish the round in under an hour!Build Your Empire
  • Dive into randomly generated worlds waiting to be settled
  • Expand your economy with booming cities, or prepare for war to protect your expansions
  • Win wars with strategic bets as you try to out-predict your friends
  • Claim victory by controlling the map with strategic settling and invasions!
Made for Multiplayer
  •  Finish games in under an hour
  • Completely simultaneous turns
  • Never need to click quickly to settle or fight: your actions are hidden from your rivals until the end of the turn
  • Play with 10+ players in a gigantic world!

For more discussion and updates, check out the discord! https://discord.gg/CSaxQEUeqt
